name: bromobenzene, NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (RH-hydroxylating or -epoxidizing)
definition: Bromobenzene + NADPH + Oxygen + H+ <=> Bromobenzene-2,3-oxide + NADP+ + H2O

pathways.rn00980: Metabolism of xenobiotics by cytochrome P450

orthologs.K07415: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily E polypeptide 1 [EC:1.14.13.-]
